Station - only for current conditions da: Station - only for current conditions data
apikey_info: Optionally enter your own NEW PWS owner apikey from Weatherunderground, leave empty if you do not have one
apikey_info_1: If left empty the current general key is tried to extract from WU webpage
country_info: Please enter a two letter country code of the country you request data for
forecast_periods_txt: Forecast as Text for next 4 days and nights
location_info: Select your location either by name (e.g. "Berlin"), Airport Code (e.g. "ZRH"), coordinates (e.g."47.3145359,8.4159812")
station_info: If you leave the station empty, then the nearest station according to the give location is picked automatically. If you are not happy with this choice you can insert here the station code of your preferred station (e.g. "IAARGAUB5"). You can find these codes e.g. on the Wundermap - click a station and look for the "Station ID"
